ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // “Hi.
Of course, our store's open.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // “No need to fear. I have the
'Study of Planet Life' right here.”{PAUSE}“No, maybe I AM a bit afraid. But, whenever
I'm reading 'Study of Planet Life,'
I can forget all my fears.”

Please discard some Materia.
